channel.title: Posts on Is Configuration Manager Dead
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Is Configuration Manager Dead

item.title: Steve Dispensa 2022-04-07
item.description: ConfigMgr is the largest deployed management solution in the known universe… is core to our ability to deliver a complete solution… we have no plans to end of life ConfigMgr. We love ConfigMgr. We just increased our development capacity on ConfigMgr. It’s nothing but a bright future for ConfigMgr. video

item.title: Brad Anderson 2019-10-04
item.description: i’ve been asked a couple times today if Microsoft Endpoint Manager means the death of #ConfigMgr — honestly, the truth is really simple: MEM means ConfigMgr has eternal life!#MSIgnite pic.twitter.com/AeMp5eGxa7 — Brad Anderson (@Anderson) November 4, 2019

item.title: Brad Anderson 2020-03-03
item.description: This video is something I’ve asked everyone in my org to watch. It was intended to be internal-only, but I can’t resist sharing it. You can read more about why I think this is so important here: https://t.co/3jvzumi8EA pic.twitter.com/dd5IuoxcNt — Brad Anderson (@Anderson) March 3, 2020

item.title: Aria Carley 2022-04-07
item.description: ConfigMgr is not only not dead, but coming soon it will be able to… video
